import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import NavBar from '../../components/NavBar'; import AdCarousel from '../../components/AdCarousel'; import ProductCard from '../../components/ProductCard'; import Footer from '../../components/Footer/Footer'; import { alertActions } from '../../redux/actions'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import './Home.css'; import { Col, Row, Container, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; function HomePage() { const message = useSelector(state => state.alert.message); const alertType = useSelector(state => state.alert.type); const dispatch = useDispatch(); //clear the alert useEffect(() => { setTimeout( function() { // clear alert after 3 secomds dispatch(alertActions.clear()); }, 3000); }, [alertType]); return (
{message && ( {message} )}
